name: Panando
description:
What is Panando?

Panando is a physics-based vertical platformer done in the classic 1-bit art style with some added twist.

The Story:

Try and help get "Eggo" the egg back to the surface after being pushed off by the evil grandad,and along meet interesting people and wicked enemies.

Disclaimer:

Some of the art/music etc. assets used in this prototype are not finalized, and you will encounter some bugs along the way, that are being fixed.
